# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(text::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(text)
    current_line = ""
    wrapped_text = ""

    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            # If the current word would exceed the line width, add a new line
            wrapped_text *= current_line * "\n"
            current_line = word
        else
            if length(current_line) > 0
                current_line *= " "
            end
            current_line *= word
        end
    end

    # Add the last line
    wrapped_text *= current_line
    return wrapped_text
end

# Example
println(wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines"))
```
